Material used.Material Name: Brain tissue from A53T mutation carrier
Material used.Description: Brain tissue from a patient with the A53T mutation in SNCA was analyzed.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Accelerates alpha-synuclein aggregation and tau pathology
Readout description.Result Description: Accumulation of insoluble nitrated alpha-synuclein and tau observed in brain tissue.
